codeSystems.name: ActionParticipantType
codeSystems.title: ActionParticipantType
codeSystems.description: The type of participant for the action.

codeSystems.name: CommonUCUMCodesForDuration
codeSystems.title: Common UCUM Codes for Duration
codeSystems.description: Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM). This value set includes all UCUM codes

codeSystems.name: Iso3166-1-2
codeSystems.title: Iso 3166 Part 1: 2 Letter Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set defines the ISO 3166 Part 1 2-letter codes

codeSystems.name: PractitionerRole
codeSystems.title: Practitioner role
codeSystems.description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the role of a Practitioner.

codeSystems.name: SnomedCTVS
codeSystems.title: Snomed Value Set
codeSystems.description: Includes all codes from SNOMED CT

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSAdmissionType
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-admissionType
codeSystems.description: Value Set of codes that specify the circumstances under which the patient was or will be admitted.

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSAdministrationMethod
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-administrationMethod
codeSystems.description: Value Set of codes that specify the specific method requested for the administration of the drug or treatment to the patient.

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSMasterfileActionCode
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-masterfileActionCode
codeSystems.description: Concepts specifying an action for a master file record.  Used in HL7 V2.x messaging in the MFE segment.

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSTelecommunicationUseCode
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-telecommunicationUseCode
codeSystems.description: Concepts for specifying a specific use of a telecommunication number.

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSIdentifierType
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-identifierType
codeSystems.description: Concepts specifying types of identififiers, as used in person and organization identification datatypes in HL7 Version 2 standards.

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSRepeatPattern
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-repeatPattern
codeSystems.description: Value Set of codes that specify the interval between repeated services. See the Comment/Usage Note in the table below, as the table contains both precoordinated codes that may be used in an HL7 field or component and also explanatory patterns i

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSDiagnosisPriority
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-diagnosisPriority
codeSystems.description: Concepts that identify the significance or priority of the diagnosis code.  Note that the codes are numeric, and the number of the code represents the ordinal priority of the associated diagnosis.  Used in the DG1 segment in Version 2 messaging.

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSProcedurePriority
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-procedurePriority
codeSystems.description: Value Set of codes specifying a number that identifies the significance or priority of the procedure code.

codeSystems.name: Hl7VSOrderType
codeSystems.title: hl7VS-orderType
codeSystems.description: Value Set of codes that specify whether the order is to be executed in an inpatient setting or an outpatient setting.
